title: (x) House Beautiful masthead - similar to Radiant, Cameo RR {Marc O, Ignacio}
content:
does anyone have a clue to what it is? tried whatthefont.com but that was no help.   
   
thanks!   
   
-bk   
   
  ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516051037im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32303.jpg)
author: jaybeekay

comments.content:
I'd say it's a customized version of Radiant, available from any number of vendors. The f and s have been tweaked, and not very well, I think.   
   
Here's Linotype's version:   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/radiant-ef/

Yes, [Radiant Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516051037/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/radiant-extra-condensed-ct/radiant-extra-condensed-medium/testdrive.html?s=House%2BBeautiful&p=72) is the closer I know, but take also a look at [Cameo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516051037/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/cameo-rr/heavyline/testdrive.html?s=House%2BBeautiful&p=72) from Red Rooster.

I'd have guessed it was a custom logo (or a font from the pre-digital era, that mag's been around forever) but they use it elsewhere on their web site so it might exist digitally. You could try calling them to find out. Or use Radiant.
